channel.title: [PI] item req when opening a gate
channel.description: ok so on my server i have a gate entrance into corp. players are just 3item'ing and specing it then gonig back how would i put a req on the gate so you msut be weilding 6 items to enter? atm there is a req on pk u must be wearing 3items to attack some1 how would i do the same thing when players try open the gate they must be wearing 6 items
